recipesJson.name: Dinner Lady Berry Remix
recipesJson.author: KRUCIAL
recipesJson.description: This remix is to mimic the New Dinner Lady Blackberry Crumble the shit is delicious and this remix does the job as well. It does need a good steep at least 7 days. I used Darren Cole's aka dazcole Lemon Tart Remix as my base then just removed the lemons and replaced them with the proper berry concentrates.

reviews.text: Hey great mix, if you like dinner lady bbc try my remix https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/79142#remixmonth_dinner_lady_blackberry_crumble_by_dougiedoug I'd love to get some feedback
